oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-04-20 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from April 20, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Little Jimmy Dickens (host/performer), guest performers Kitty Wells and Johnnie & Jack, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 915th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chet Atkins; Minnie Pearl; Johnnie & Jack; Stringbean; Little Jimmy Dickens
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Little Jimmy Dickens introduces Chet Atkins -- Guitar Polka (Chet Atkins) -- Little Jimmy Dickens introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Little Jimmy Dickens) -- Prince Albert commercial (Minnie Pearl, Little Jimmy Dickens) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Little Jimmy Dickens introduces Johnnie & Jack -- The Banana Boat Song (Johnnie & Jack) -- Little Jimmy Dickens introduces Stringbean -- Uncle Pen (Stringbean) -- Little Jimmy Dickens talks -- I Never Had The Blues (Little Jimmy Dickens) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Little Jimmy Dickens) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Station announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Jackson, Tommy; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Wells, Kitty; Johnnie & Jack; Wright, Johnnie, 1914-2011; Anglin, Jack, 1916-1963; Dickens, Little Jimmy, 1920-
